attributes.action: Let the people choose: David Cameron to disolve parliament and call a snap election
attributes.additional_details:
With the results of the recent local and European elections in, it is undeniably clear that the UK electorate aren't happy with the work being done by the LibCon coalition.

It's time to give us all the opportunity to move on and to let us choose who runs our country.

Why put off the inevitable and make the electorate suffer another 12 months of this shambles of a government - let us choose now!

People power can't continue to be ignored - listen to the electorate David Cameron, dissolve parliament and let us have our say!
